items.label: Rebase
items.desc: Reapply commits on top of another branch.

items.label: Pull remote
items.desc: Fetch and merge from remote branch.

items.label: Revert commit
items.desc: Make new commit that undoes given commit.

items.label: Bisect
items.desc: Binary search to find buggy commit.

items.label: Install dep (yarn)
items.desc: Install a package dependency with Yarn.

items.label: Install dev dep (yarn)
items.desc: Install a dev dependency with Yarn.

items.label: Remove dep (yarn)
items.desc: Remove a package dependency with Yarn.

items.label: Update dep (npm)
items.desc: Update a package to latest allowed version.

items.label: Install global (yarn)
items.desc: Install a package globally with Yarn.

items.label: Audit security (npm)
items.desc: Run a security audit on dependencies.

items.label: Audit security (yarn)
items.desc: Run a security audit with Yarn.

items.label: getStaticProps
items.desc: Fetch data at build time (Pages Router).

items.label: getServerSideProps
items.desc: Fetch data on every request (Pages Router).

items.label: getStaticPaths
Client-side fetch (useEffect)
Async server component
items.desc: Fetch directly inside a server component (App Router).

items.label: Fetch with cache
items.code: const data = await fetch("https://api.com/data", { cache: "force-cache" }).then(r => r.json())
items.desc: Static fetch (default) — cached at build time.

items.label: Fetch no cache
items.code: const data = await fetch("https://api.com/data", { cache: "no-store" }).then(r => r.json())

items.label: ISR (Revalidate)
items.code: const data = await fetch("https://api.com/data", { next: { revalidate: 60 } }).then(r => r.json())

items.label: Route handler (GET)
Route handler (POST)
Dynamic route params
items.desc: Access `[id]` from dynamic route params (App Router).

items.label: Search params
items.desc: Read query params in App Router.

items.label: State update from prev
items.desc: Safe state update using previous value.

items.label: Effect with cleanup
Lazy init state
items.desc: Initialize state only once using a function.

items.label: Memoize callback
items.desc: Keep stable function reference across renders.

items.label: React.memo
items.desc: Prevent re-render if props are unchanged.

items.label: Derived state
items.desc: Compute values from state instead of storing redundantly.

items.label: Reducer
items.desc: State logic in a reducer function (alternative to useState).

items.label: useContext
items.desc: Consume context values inside a component.

items.label: Conditional render
items.desc: Render different components based on condition.

items.label: Short-circuit render
items.desc: Render only if condition is truthy.

items.label: Custom hook
Render props
items.desc: Pass a function as a child for flexible rendering.

items.label: Controlled component
items.desc: Form element controlled by React state.

items.label: Uncontrolled component
items.desc: Form element stores its own state, accessed via ref.

items.label: Forward ref
items.desc: Forward refs to DOM elements in custom components.

items.label: Portals
items.desc: Render children into a different part of the DOM.

items.label: Error boundary
items.desc: Catch errors in component tree (only class components).

items.label: Suspense
items.desc: Show fallback while async components load.

items.label: Prop drilling solution
items.code: // Instead of passing props deeply, use Context or custom hooks
items.desc: Avoid passing props through many levels.

items.label: Higher Order Component
items.desc: Function that takes a component and returns an enhanced component.

items.label: Fragment
items.desc: Group children without adding extra DOM nodes.

items.label: Keyed animation list
items.desc: Use keys for stable animations in lists.

items.label: Touch
items.desc: Create an empty file or update timestamp.

items.label: For loop
items.code: for f in *.txt; do echo $f; done

items.label: If condition
items.code: if [ -f file.txt ]; then echo exists; fi

items.label: Inspect image
items.desc: View detailed info of an image.

items.label: Compose Exec
items.desc: Run command in a service container.

items.label: Compose Scale
items.desc: Run multiple instances of a service.

items.label: Compose Config
items.desc: Validate and view full compose config.

items.label: Array contains
items.desc: Match documents with a specific array value.

items.label: Array operator
items.desc: Match if array contains any of given values.

items.label: Type check
items.desc: Find docs with specific BSON type.

items.label: 301 Moved Permanently
items.desc: Resource moved to a new permanent URI.

items.label: 303 See Other
items.desc: Redirect to another URI using GET.

items.label: 405 Method Not Allowed
items.desc: HTTP method not supported for resource.

items.label: 408 Request Timeout
items.desc: Client did not send request in time.

items.label: 501 Not Implemented
items.desc: Server does not support request method.

items.label: 504 Gateway Timeout
items.desc: Upstream server failed to respond in time.

items.label: 505 HTTP Version Not Supported
items.desc: Server does not support request HTTP version.

items.label: Letters only
items.desc: Match only alphabets (no digits, no symbols).

items.label: Whitespace
items.desc: Match one or more whitespace characters.

items.label: Non-whitespace
items.desc: Match one or more non-space characters.

items.label: Non-word characters
items.desc: Match anything except letters, digits, underscore.

items.label: Start of string
items.desc: Match only if at start of string.

items.label: End of string
items.desc: Match only if at end of string.

items.label: Username
items.desc: 3–16 chars, letters, numbers, underscore, dot, dash.

items.label: Password (strong)
items.desc: Min 8 chars, 1 upper, 1 lower, 1 number, 1 special.

items.label: No special chars
items.desc: Allow only letters, numbers, and spaces.

items.label: Lookahead (positive)
items.desc: Match digit only if followed by 'px'.

items.label: Lookbehind (negative)
items.desc: Match number not preceded by USD.

items.desc: Extend existing classes with new functionality.

items.desc: User input ke liye editable text box.

items.label: Form
items.desc: Group of input fields jisme validation support hota hai.

items.label: Radio
items.desc: Group me ek option select karne ke liye radio button.

items.label: Slider
items.desc: Numeric range select karne ke liye slider.

items.label: Push
items.desc: Naya page stack me add karta hai.

items.label: Pop
items.desc: Current page ko stack se remove karke pichle page par jata hai.

items.label: PushReplacement
items.desc: Current page replace karke naya page show karta hai.

items.label: Named Routes
items.desc: Predefined route name se navigation karta hai.

items.label: Navigator 2.0
items.desc: Declarative routing system for advanced navigation.

items.label: setState
items.desc: Widget tree ko rebuild karta hai jab data change hota hai.

items.label: InheritedWidget
items.desc: Widget tree ke through data propagate karne ka tarika.

items.label: Provider
items.desc: State management ke liye widely used package.

items.label: Bloc
items.desc: Business logic ko separate karne ke liye Bloc pattern.

items.label: http get
items.desc: GET request bhejta hai aur response lata hai.

items.label: http post
items.desc: POST request data ke sath send karta hai.

items.label: Dio
items.code: var dio = Dio(); var res = await dio.get(url);
items.desc: Advanced networking library with interceptors and retries.

items.label: FutureBuilder
items.desc: Async data ke sath UI build karta hai.

items.label: AnimatedContainer
items.desc: Implicit animation for properties like size, color, padding.

items.label: Hero
items.desc: Page transitions ke beech shared element animation.

items.label: List tables
items.desc: Show all tables in current database.

items.label: Create table
items.code: CREATE TABLE users(id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, age INT);

items.label: Update row
items.code: UPDATE users SET age=26 WHERE name='Alice';

items.label: Order by
items.code: SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;

items.label: Group by
items.code: SELECT age, COUNT(*) FROM users GROUP BY age;

items.label: Having
items.code: SELECT age, COUNT(*) FROM users GROUP BY age HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

items.label: Inner join
items.code: SELECT u.name, o.amount FROM users u INNER JOIN orders o ON u.id=o.user_id;
items.desc: Join matching rows from two tables.

items.label: Left join
items.code: SELECT u.name, o.amount FROM users u LEFT JOIN orders o ON u.id=o.user_id;

items.label: Right join
items.code: SELECT u.name, o.amount FROM users u RIGHT JOIN orders o ON u.id=o.user_id;

items.label: Full outer join
items.code: SELECT u.name, o.amount FROM users u FULL OUTER JOIN orders o ON u.id=o.user_id;

items.label: Union
items.code: SELECT name FROM users1 UNION SELECT name FROM users2;

items.label: Union all
items.code: SELECT name FROM users1 UNION ALL SELECT name FROM users2;

items.label: Prepared statement
items.code: PREPARE stmt(int) AS INSERT INTO users(age) VALUES($1);

items.label: Functions
items.code: CREATE FUNCTION add(a INT, b INT) RETURNS INT AS $$ BEGIN RETURN a+b; END; $$ LANGUAGE plpgsql;

items.label: Trigger
items.code: CREATE TRIGGER trg BEFORE INSERT ON users FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE FUNCTION log_insert();

items.label: List push left
items.desc: Add elements to start of list.

items.label: List push right
items.desc: Add elements to end of list.

items.label: Transactions multi
items.code:
MULTI
SET a 1
INCR a
EXEC

items.label: Watch key
items.code:
WATCH key
MULTI
SET key 1
EXEC

items.label: Flush DB
items.desc: Delete all keys in current database.

items.label: Flush all
items.desc: Delete all keys in all databases.

items.label: Get pods
items.desc: List all pods in current namespace.

items.label: Annotate resource
items.code: kubectl annotate pod mypod description='web app'

items.label: Get all resources
items.desc: List all resource types in namespace.
